Class Packet

java.lang.Object
  Packet
Direct Known Subclasses:
RoutingPacket
public class Packet
extends java.lang.Object

The Packet class models a network packet.

Constructor Detail

Packet

public Packet(int s,
              int d)
Packet construtor for the super class. This defaults to setting the packet type to be the UNKNOWN type.

Parameters:
s - source address
d - destination address

public void decrement_ttl()
